title: Is my vision that bad? No, it's just a bug in Apple's Calculator
dot:
digraph apple_calculator_bug{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#e0f7fa", fontname="Arial"];title[label="Is my vision that bad? 
No, it’s just a bug in Apple’s Calculator", shape=rect, style="filled", fillcolor="#b2ebf2", fontcolor="#006064"]; symptom[label="Symptom:
Wobbly digits in binary display", fillcolor="#ffffff"];cause[label="Cause:
Possible float coordinate rounding error", fillcolor="#ffffff"];contact[label="Contact:
No feedback option from Apple", fillcolor="#ffffff"];conclusion[label="Conclusion:
It's a bug, not bad vision", fillcolor="#ffffff"]; comments[label="Comments:
Various user experiences and suggestions", shape=ellipse, fillcolor="#fff9c4"]; title->symptom;symptom->cause;symptom->contact;symptom->conclusion;conclusion->comments;}

title: Orphaning bcachefs-tools in Debian
dot:
digraph bcachefs_adventure{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];A[label="Introduction to bcache
(Linux block cache system)"];B[label="Announcement of bcachefs
(2015)"];C[label="Features of bcachefs:
- Built-in compression
- Built-in encryption
- Check-summing
- RAID implementations"];D[label="Testing bcachefs
(Need to compile from source)"];E[label="Merge into Linux
(2019)"];F[label="First git snapshot in Debian
(0.1+git20190829.aa2a42b)"];G[label="Packaging in Debian
(19 Jan 2020)"];H[label="Version 1.2 released
(End of 2023)"];I[label="Rust utilities added
(Challenges with Rust packaging)"];J[label="Dependency Relaxation
- Issues with building in Debian"];K[label="Packaging Challenges:
- Impossible to maintain in Debian stable
- Concerns for long-term support"];L[label="Upstream Developer's Stance
- Bundling dependencies required"];M[label="Decision to Orphan bcachefs-tools
- Removed from unstable
- Ancient versions in stable removed"];N[label="Conclusion:
- Evaluate long-term support for bcachefs"];A->B;B->C;C->D;D->E;E->F;F->G;G->H;H->I;I->J;J->K;K->L;L->M;M->N;}
